content.brief: The most successful organizations are the ones that are constantly challenging their own limitations. Constant innovation and wise investment will allow federal agencies to improve systematically instead of sporadically and unevenly, providing a smoother, more effective path to tighter, secure IT systems. Looking to the future, we need to build a modern enterprise architecture that enables us to securely and affordably deliver a more open and transparent government. We need to deliver cloud and mobility solutions that enhance productivity yet have security “baked in,” not bolted on as an afterthought. Across all departments and agencies, we need to give our senior leaders the actionable business case information they need to plan, program and budget so that we can rapidly deliver innovative solutions that are effective, efficient, and secure.
